parameters.name: Accelerate
parameters.description: Indicates whether an acceleration link is enabled for image subscription. The subscription acceleration feature is in public preview. The feature is optimized based on scheduling policies and network links to accelerate image subscription.

parameters.name: NamespaceName
parameters.description: The name of the Container Registry namespace.

parameters.name: Override
parameters.description: Indicates whether the original image is overwritten.

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description: The operating system and architecture. If the source repository contains a multi-arch image, only the specified operating system and architecture are subscribed to the destination repository of the Enterprise Edition instance. Subscribe to the destination repository of an Enterprise Edition instance

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the Container Registry repository.

parameters.name: SourceProvider
parameters.description:
The source of the artifact.

Valid values:

*   DOCKER_HUB: Docker Hub
*   GCR: GCR
*   QUAY: Quay.io

parameters.name: TagRegexp
parameters.description: The image tag in the subscription source repository. Regular expressions are supported.
